name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer, I leverage extensive experience in key technologies such as **React**, **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Postgres** to craft high-performance applications in dynamic environments. My solid background in modern software development allows me to create scalable and efficient solutions, employing **CircleCI** and **Spinnaker** for seamless CI/CD automation.
With 8 years of experience in full stack development, I also possess proficiency in **Ruby on Rails**, ensuring robust back-end functionalities. My commitment to building secure applications aligns with industry compliance standards. I additionally bring expertise in integrating emerging technologies like AI/ML, enhancing applications for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, and implementing MLOps workflows.
